SEARCH
Package Manager

Class ManagerController

java.lang.Object
Manager.ManagerController
public class ManagerController extends Object
The ManagerController class provides static methods for managing Manager entities. This includes creation, profile updates, and data retrieval by ID.

      public ManagerController()

  • Method Details

    • createManager

      public static Manager createManager(User user)
      Creates and returns a Manager object using the associated User profile. If no Manager is found for the given User ID, returns null.
      Parameters:
      user - the User object representing the manager's account
      Returns:
      the Manager object or null if not found

    • updateAge

      public static boolean updateAge(Manager manager, int age)
      Updates the age of the specified manager.
      Parameters:
      manager - the Manager whose age will be updated
      age - the new age to set
      Returns:
      true if update is successful, false otherwise

    • updateName

      public static boolean updateName(Manager manager, String name)
      Updates the name of the specified manager.
      Parameters:
      manager - the Manager whose name will be updated
      name - the new name to set
      Returns:
      true if update is successful, false otherwise

    • updateMaritalStatus

      public static boolean updateMaritalStatus(Manager manager, String maritalStatus)
      Updates the marital status of the specified manager.
      Parameters:
      manager - the Manager whose marital status will be updated
      maritalStatus - a string representing the new marital status ("M" or "S")
      Returns:
      true if update is successful, false otherwise

    • getNameById

      public static String getNameById(String id)
      Retrieves the name of a manager by their ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the manager's NRIC/ID
      Returns:
      the manager's name if found, otherwise null
